full_summary:
================================

* **Expected Contract End Date (Date prévue de fin du contrat):** August 31, 2023

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category (Categorie d'approvisionnement):** Goods and Services (FPS - ganà interesting - scrollbarvip Lowest Price)

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
